articles.author: Annika Kim Constantino
articles.title: 'Stop ripping us off': Senate grills Novo Nordisk CEO on weight loss drug pricing - CNBC
articles.description: Sen. Bernie Sanders argues that Novo Nordisk charges Americans substantially higher prices for its drugs than it does for patients in other countries.
articles.content: Novo Nordisk's top executive faced a Senate grilling on Tuesday over the high prices of the company's weight loss drug Wegovy and diabetes treatment Ozempic, as demand for both injections soars in th… [+7379 chars]
